message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $12,000 is already a competitive price for what this product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
